text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My dear Top Road! Would you like 
to join us bathing in the sunset?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Bathing…… Umm, in the colours 
of the sunset…… or something?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I speak of a rose bath, of course! 
However, as we don't have an open air 
bath, we'll have to make do with the pool!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
U-Umm…… I-It's all my faaault～! 
I wanted them to float with me…… 
but they all sank down insteaaad!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I-Is that a riddle? Float with you, then 
sank down…… so basically……!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
……After a series of unlucky events, you 
accidentally dropped a bunch of roses into 
the pool while bringing them to the baths!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And it was the most humorous of comedies! 
I thought her work of art should be enjoyed 
to the fullest, so I came to invite you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Hm-hm…… Hmm? Did you two just leave the pool like that?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
If I remember right…… Ayabe said that 
she's gonna do some training in the pool.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
T-There's sure to be lots of others going 
there too, huhhh……? What if everyone 
in the pool is upset right now……!?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaa-ha-ha! The pool fallen into complete chaos, and there, yours truly makes her dashing entrance! Truly outstanding!
